private_information: I am agent_1 and I am allowed to move disks: A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H.
I can only perform primitive moves that involve the disks A through H.
agent_1.goal: Cooperate with agent_2 to achieve the global Tower of Hanoi final configuration.

private_information: I am agent_2 and I am allowed to move disks: I, J, K, L, M, N, O.
I can only perform primitive moves that involve the disks I through O.
agent_2.goal: Cooperate with agent_1 to achieve the global Tower of Hanoi final configuration.

private_information: I am the orchestrator and coordinate agent_1 and agent_2.
I will integrate their partial sequences and produce the final PDDL domain and problem for FastDownward and a combined ordered move list.
orchestrator.goal: Integrate agents' contributions and produce a valid plan and PDDL for FastDownward that achieves the global goal.

public_information: This is a 3-peg Tower of Hanoi instance with 15 disks labeled A (smallest) through O (largest).
Initial configuration: left peg has (top-to-bottom) A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, M, N, O. Middle and right pegs are empty.
Goal configuration: left peg has (top-to-bottom) C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, M, N, O; middle peg is empty; right peg has (top-to-bottom) A, B.
Rules: only one disk may be moved at a time, and a disk may only be placed on an empty peg or on top of a larger disk.
Agent restrictions: agent_1 may move only disks A-H. Agent_2 may move only disks I-O.

partial_moves.system_prompt: You are agent_1 responsible for disks A through H. Provide a partial ordered sequence of primitive moves that only include moves of disks A-H. Each move must respect Tower of Hanoi rules. Do not produce PDDL. Deliver moves in the exact text format: 'agent_1: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'.
partial_moves.prompt: You are agent_1. Use the public information about the environment and your private information about which disks you may move. Produce a sequence of primitive moves that involve only disks A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H. Ensure each move is legal under Tower of Hanoi rules. If you lack information about movements of disks you cannot move, only provide the moves you can perform and do not make assumptions about the other disks.

partial_moves.system_prompt: You are agent_2 responsible for disks I through O. Provide a partial ordered sequence of primitive moves that only include moves of disks I-O. Each move must respect Tower of Hanoi rules. Do not produce PDDL. Deliver moves in the exact text format: 'agent_2: move disk X from pegY to pegZ'.
partial_moves.prompt: You are agent_2. Use the public information about the environment and your private information about which disks you may move. Produce a sequence of primitive moves that involve only disks I, J, K, L, M, N, O. Ensure each move is legal under Tower of Hanoi rules. If you lack information about movements of disks you cannot move, only provide the moves you can perform and do not make assumptions about the other disks.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert orchestrator for multi-agent planning. Integrate the partial move sequences from agent_1 and agent_2 and produce a single coherent PDDL domain and PDDL problem file suitable for the FastDownward planner. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Keep actions for agent_1 and agent_2 distinct and include agent-specific action predicates or action names to reflect the movement restrictions. Also produce a final ordered list of primitive moves in the format 'agent_i: move disk X from pegY to pegZ' that achieves the goal and respects all constraints.
pddl.prompt: You are the orchestrator. You will receive two partial move sequences from agent_1 and agent_2. Integrate them to: 1) produce a PDDL domain and problem targeting the FastDownward solver that models a 3-peg Tower of Hanoi with 15 disks and enforces that agent_1 can only move disks A-H and agent_2 can only move disks I-O; 2) produce an ordered list of primitive moves in the exact format 'agent_i: move disk X from pegY to pegZ' that achieves the stated goal configuration from the provided initial configuration while obeying Tower of Hanoi rules and agent restrictions. If the agents' partial sequences are incomplete, complete them in a correct and minimal way consistent with both agents' allowed moves.
